I think you'll really enjoy "Treasure Planet"! It's a visually stunning animated film that combines classic adventure with sci-fi elements, featuring an all-star voice cast including Martin Short and Joseph Gordon-Levitt. With its swashbuckling action and memorable characters, it's a thrilling ride from start to finish.

If you're looking for something a bit more grounded in reality, I'd also recommend "The Right Stuff". This 1983 film tells the inspiring true story of the early days of space exploration, featuring an impressive ensemble cast including Ed Harris, Dennis Quaid, and Sam Shepard. With its engaging characters and fascinating historical context, it's a compelling watch for anyone interested in the subject.
